. By this summer, developers with games on Facebook's platform will have to accept payments made with the social network's own in-house currency, Facebook Credits. By requiring game developers to offer Facebook Credits, it brings them inline with what you see on other gaming platforms such as Microsoft or Nintendo, said Todd Northcutt of GameSpy Technology.
